title: Butternut Squash Ravioli with Brown Butter Sauce
directions: Melt the butter in a large skillet heated on medium heat. Continue to cook the butter until it becomes a golden-brown color, about 5â€“8 minutes. Add the cream and sage and simmer for about a minute.
Add Parmesan, salt, pepper, and parsley. Simmer for another minute, add raviolis, and let heat for a minute or two.
Plate and sprinkle with toasted walnuts.
ingredients: 2 (9-oz) packages of premade butternut squash ravioli, cooked according to package directions
